nodes.bodyText: IMHO this should be a default implementation returning e.g. N/A in order to remain backwards compatible ...
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -218,6 +218,15 @@ static HonoConnection newConnection(final Vertx vertx, final ClientConfigPropert */ boolean isShutdown(); + /** + * Gets the remote container id as advertised by the peer. + *

+ * Returns {@code null} if the client is currently not connected. + * + * @return The remote container id or {@code null}. + */ + String getRemoteContainer();

nodes.bodyText: I do not think that we should put that much semantics into the returned value in order to not encourage users to actually test connectivity using this property ...

+ * Returns {@code null} if the client is currently not connected.
